login.verification_type: Select the type of account verification
login.username_inv: Username must be at least 3 characters long
login.firstname_inv: First name must be at least 2 characters long
login.lastname_inv: Last name must be at least 2 characters long
login.email_inv: Please enter a valid email address
login.phone_inv: Please enter a valid phone number
login.password_inv: Password must be at least 6 characters long
login.error_occured: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again in a moment.
login.signup_success_phone: Konto użytkownika zostało założone pomyślnie. Zaloguj się by dokończyć weryfikację konta
login.signup_success_email: Konto użytkownika zostało założone pomyślnie. Kliknij w link aktywacyjny wysłany na podany adres email by zweryfikować konto
login.verification_success: The account has been verified successfully. You can log in now

verify.to_be_able: To be able to take full advantage of our website, you still need to verify your account.
verify.info: An e-mail with an activation link has been sent to your {{email}} e-mail address. Click on the link provided to validate your account.
verify.info_phone: An activation code has been sent to your {{phone}} phone number. Enter it below to verify your account.
verify.activation_code_send: The activation code has been resent

collection.comment.error.msg: Your comment cannot be longer than 250 characters
collection.overview_question: Are you sure you want to go to the summary?
collection.no_comments: Collection has no comments. You can add a comment first

home.welcome_text_1: Need in-kind assistance? Create your own collection, tell your story and get help from people in the Kordi community!
home.welcome_text_2: Do you own unnecessary items? Do you want to support others in need? On our site you will find many collections created by individuals or organizations!
home.welcome_text_3: Who can set up a collection on
home.person_text: Any private person of age with an email address or phone number can create their own collection on our portal. Thanks to Kordi, it will be easier for you to reach more people who can support your collection. Start collecting now!
home.organization_text: Are you active in an organization and need a medium to reach more people? Just create an account on Kordi and start collecting today!

user.cannot.be.empty: Username and password cannot be empty
user.error: Some error occured. Please try again later
user.email.exists: Email address is already in use
user.phone.exists: Phone number is already in use
user.not.verified.email: The account has not been verified. An email with an activation link has been sent to your email address

email.send.failed.connection: We are sorry but the email could not be sent
email.send.failed: We are sorry but the email could not be sent

phone.verification.code.not.valid: The entered code is not valid. The account may have already been activated or the code has expired
phone.verification.code.send.wait: You must wait {{time}} seconds to resend the activation code

add-collection.text: Complete the form below and then click
add-collection.create.text: Are you sure you want to create a new collection?

add-collection.desc.error.msg: The collection description must contain from 3 to 500 characters
add-collection.title: Collection name
add-collection.item.name: Name
add-collection.item.name.error: The name must contain between 1 and 30 characters
add-collection.item.type.text: Specify the type of item and its quantity
add-collection.location.city.error: City must be between 1 and 30 characters
add-collection.location.city.street: Street must be between 1 and 30 characters
